name: Tower Offense (MiceOrMouses)
description:
In this pretty bland tower defense game considering the lack of music, YOU'RE the enemy that must push your units to the enemies base and destroy it using your own heal towers that regenerate your units' health.

Welp, since that's done, HI! And welcome to my 4th (3rd? idk at this point) game for a game jam! (The "My First Game Jam" game jam). Hopefully, this game isn't so boring and you enjoy it!
